thread.section_title: Hotel 48LEX New York - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: One of my favorites
thread.title_full: One of my favorites - Review of Hotel 48LEX New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Jonathan E
title: One of my favorites
text: Nice, quiet and small. Only a few rooms on each floor. The rooms are appointed nice; the floor plan had wrap around floor/ceiling windows, king bed, roomy bath with walk in shower and a small galley area. Very clean and quiet/private. Good gym (and rarely used). Simple breakfast. Great location and very good rates for this key midtown location. I'll be back
